abstract: NFL Roundup; Seahawks running back Marshawn Lynch undergoes hernia surgery that is expected to sideline him for at least three weeks.
lead_paragraph: The Seahawks running back had surgery to repair an injury related to a sports hernia and is expected to miss at least three weeks.
snippet: The Seahawks running back had surgery to repair an injury related to a sports hernia and is expected to miss at least three weeks.
